submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        ans = inf
        n = len(nums)
        '''
        1.
        '''
        maxRanges = []
        dis = []
        for i in range(n // 2):
            e1 = max(nums[i], k - nums[i])
            e2 = max(nums[n - 1 - i], k - nums[n - 1 - i])
            maxRanges.append(max(e1, e2))
            dis.append(abs(nums[i] - nums[n - 1 - i]))
        
        cnt = Counter(dis)
        maxRanges.sort()

        for X in dis:
            li = bisect_left(maxRanges, X)

            ans = min(ans, 2 * li + (n//2 - li) - cnt[X])
        
        return ans
